  • Method Details

    • preparationOfConstructionPlan

      void preparationOfConstructionPlan(Building building, Client client, List<Material> materials, List<EngineeringSystem> systems) throws Exception
      Method for preparing a building for construction. The result of the method will be a record of the object
      Parameters:
      building - - the building we are going to build
      client - - building owner
      materials - - materials from which the building will be constructed
      systems - - communications that will be in the house
      Throws:
      Exception - - exception will be thrown if the building is not possible to add

    • selectionOfMaterials

      default List<Material> selectionOfMaterials(String str) throws Exception
      Obtaining a list of materials entered by the user
      Parameters:
      str - - string entered by the user
      Returns:
      - list of materials
      Throws:
      Exception - - exception will be thrown if the material is not found

      Returns:
      - list of engineering system
      Throws:
      Exception - - exception will be thrown if the engineering system is not found

    • preparationForBuilding

      void preparationForBuilding(Building building) throws IOException
      A method for adding information about workers and equipment who will participate in construction. And approximate completion dates for construction
      Parameters:
      building - - the building we are going to build
      Throws:
      IOException - - exception will be thrown if it is not possible to update the building data

    • distributionOfWorkers

      default List<Worker> distributionOfWorkers(Building building, String path) throws IOException
      Distribution of workers for this construction
      Parameters:
      building - - building on the basis of which the number of employees will be calculated
      path - - path to the file from which workers should be selected
      Returns:
      - list of employees
      Throws:
      IOException - - exception will be thrown if the path is incorrect

    • distributionOfConstructionEquipment

      Parameters:

      path - - path to the file from which workers should be selected
      Returns:
      - list of construction equipments
      Throws:
      IOException - - exception will be thrown if the path is incorrect

    • coordinationOfConstructionTerms

      default LocalDate coordinationOfConstructionTerms(Building building) throws ClassCastException
      Calculating the approximate construction time for a given building
      Parameters:
      building - - building for which the approximate completion date will be calculated
      Returns:
      - construction completion date
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - - exception will be thrown if the building type is indicated incorrectly

      Parameters:
      building - - building for which the total amount is calculated
      Returns:
      - total amount
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - - exception will be thrown if the building type is indicated incorrectlyt

    • calculationCostOfConstructionEquipment

      default double calculationCostOfConstructionEquipment(Building building, int time)
      Calculating the cost of construction equipment
      Parameters:
      building - - building for which the calculation is being carried out
      time - - duration of construction in months
      Returns:
      - amount spent of construction equipment
